title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Expenditure in million GBP, with a total of 14 data points.
Overall Expenditure in million GBP has increased over the Year
Expenditure in million GBP is gradually constant from 2005 to 2018.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Max Expenditure in million GBP about 5631.0 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Expenditure in million GBP about 3677.0 was recorded at Year 2008
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Expenditure in million GBP, with a total of 14 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2010 to 2015.
Also, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2015 to 2018.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2005 to 2008.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2008 to 2010.
